import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; interface BeanOriginProps {} const BeanOrigin: React.FC = () => { return (

Discover Coffee Bean Origins

Explore the rich stories behind our coffee beans sourced from around the world. Each origin has its unique flavor profile and characteristics that contribute to your perfect cup.

Roasting Profiles

Our roasting profiles are carefully crafted to enhance the natural flavors of the beans. From light to dark roasts, each profile brings out distinct notes that cater to every coffee lover's palate.

Flavor Notes

  • Fruity and Floral
  • Chocolate and Nutty
  • Spicy and Earthy

Sustainability Commitment

We are dedicated to sustainable sourcing practices that support farmers and protect the environment. Our beans are ethically sourced, ensuring fair trade and eco-friendly farming methods.

Coffee Education

Join us in our mission to educate coffee enthusiasts about the journey from bean to cup. Learn about brewing techniques, tasting notes, and the science behind coffee.

Back to Home
); }; export default BeanOrigin;
